name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior QA Engineer with 8 years of experience in test automation, utilizing frameworks such as **Selenium**, **Playwright**, and cloud services like **AWS**. Proficient in quality assurance processes with a strong command of test automation strategies. My technical acumen includes **Python** and **Django**, enhancing collaboration with development teams to deliver high-quality software solutions. I have a solid foundation in **React**, enabling effective cross-functional communication in fast-paced environments.
In addition to my technical expertise, I excel in leadership and problem-solving, having successfully led teams to streamline testing processes and implement best practices. My extensive experience in mentoring and guiding junior QA engineers fosters a collaborative atmosphere that drives project success.
